key.name: enabled
key.description: Enable or disable the maximize to workspace functionality

key.name: filter-mode
key.description: Filter mode for applications: "none" (all apps), "blacklist" (exclude listed apps), or "whitelist" (only listed apps)

key.name: blacklist
key.description: List of application WM_CLASS names to exclude from maximize behavior

key.name: whitelist
key.description: List of application WM_CLASS names to include in maximize behavior

key.name: move-on-maximize
key.description: Move window to empty workspace when maximized (not just fullscreen)

key.name: restore-on-close
key.description: Return to previous workspace when closing a maximized window
